description:
WATCH Disney XD is a free app that allows you to watch full episodes, clips and more of your favorite Disney XD shows on your tablet, phone or computer! 
If you subscribe to Disney XD through one of our participating TV providers, you will have full access to the following:

-Watch full episodes of your favorite shows anytime, anywhere.* 
-Watch what’s on Disney XD LIVE!*
-Play new games featuring some of your favorite Disney XD stars**

*Certain restrictions apply.  Viewing of content requires current verified WATCH Disney XD subscription.  

*Live video and the newest full episodes are only available with a participating TV provider.

To view participating TV providers available in your area and sign in, download the WATCH Disney XD app and select “Get More!” 


For more information visit:  http://watchdisneyxd.go.com/help

U.S. based Internet connection required.

Privacy Policy: http://disneyprivacycenter.com/ 
Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/ 

**WATCH Disney XD games are optimized for iPhone 4 & up, iPod touch 5 & up and iPad 2 & up.
releaseNotes:
WATCH MORE. PLAY MORE. Our app keeps getting better! Don’t miss out and update today! 

-JUST IN: The Prank-a-tron is even more PRANKTASTIC! 

-GOODBYE TO BUGS: Play games without the fuss! We squished a few of those pesky bugs for even better playtime. 
      
-WISH LIST: Can’t download right now?  Just add us to your App Store Wish List for later!
